sentences.en: An overheated economy can only exacerbate an incipient deterioration in inflationary expectations.
sentences.cn: 经济过热只会使初显恶化态势的通胀预期进一步恶化.

sentences.en: In some fungi, there is evidence of incipient speciation.
sentences.cn: 在某些真菌中, 有新发生的物种形成的证据.

sentences.en: It need not be supposed that all varieties or incipient species attain the rank of species.
sentences.cn: 不要以为一切变种或初期物种,都会达到物种的阶段.

sentences.en: It was now the season of incipient preparation for dinner.
sentences.cn: 现在正是刚开始做饭的时候.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the efficacy of an operation to incipient pterygium.
sentences.cn: 目的观察初发翼状胬肉的一种手术方法的效果.

sentences.en: She felt for him an incipient tenderness, but scarcely any passion.
sentences.cn: 她对他的好感只是一种刚刚萌芽的柔情, 还根本谈不上什么爱情.

sentences.en: The incipient lethal temperature are shifted upward by acclimation to warmer temperature.
sentences.cn: 四角蛤蜊起始致死温是随驯化温度的变化而改变.

sentences.en: The LV zone is due to interstitial free volatiles and incipient melting.
sentences.cn: 低速层是由于空隙自由挥发和初期的熔融作用造成的.

sentences.en: The medicine stopped David's incipient cold.
sentences.cn: 这药制止了大卫初发的伤风症.

sentences.en: There were signs of incipient panic.
sentences.cn: 出现了早期的恐慌迹象。

sentences.en: This result is helpful to select appropriate incipient equation.
sentences.cn: 为合理选用起动公式提供了依据.

sentences.en: What we see then is an incipient global inflation.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们看到的是初期阶段的全球通胀.

sentences.en: When flow velocity decreases below the corresponding incipient motion condition , no sediment movement occurs.
sentences.cn: 当水流速度小于相应的起始运动时, 将无泥沙运动.

sentences.en: Yet the effects of such incipient protectionism have been small, so far.
sentences.cn: 不过到目前为止,这种早期保护主义的影响还比较小.
